EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.XLE.All.N.G.N.13061.FN POL (NEW).Email 5 - awareness
EmailTemplate.subject: Technology to give your properties an edge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Smart building connectivity that frees space, costs and energy Enhance your reputation for cutting-edge properties. Give your buyers and tenants the connectivity they’re demanding. Create additional value by liberating floorspace and reducing your portfolio’s carbon footprint.
Passive Optical LAN is a new solution for smart building connectivity. It uses the same technology that drives the Internet to outperform a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN everywhere you look: performance, cost, flexibility, longevity and security.
Installing Passive Optical LAN in your properties, enables you to:
- Provide the fastest broadband speeds.
- Satisfy demand for eco-friendly property developments.
- Lower capital and operating costs for you and your customers.
Wherever you are in your development plans, Nokia Passive Optical LAN can improve them. Visit our website to learn more. U.S. and Canada:+1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)
Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)
Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>
Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
